name: Hi-Point 9mm magazine
description: 8 round standard capacity magazine for any Hi-point chambered in 9mm.

name: Hi-Point 9mm carbine magazine
description: 10 carbine magazine for any Hi-point chambered in 9mm

name: Hi-Point 9mm Extended Magazine
description: 15 round magazine for any Hi-Point chambered in 9mm
//: The extended magazine is much less reliable then the standard magazine
